summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 MERCEDES-BENZ E400. IN FEBRUARY OF 2019, THE VEHICLE WAS INCLUDED IN AN UNKNOWN RECALL REGARDING THE PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG. RALLYE MOTORS (1600 NORTHERN BLVD, ROSLYN, NY 11576, (516) 625-1000) STATED THAT THERE WAS NO REMEDY FOR THE RECALL. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE.
